description: This file defines a SearchBar component for a frontend application, implementing accessible (a11y) search input with sample cycling and clear functionality, integrated with a global store and translation plugin.

classes.name: SearchBar
classes.description: A Blits component representing an accessible search bar with sample cycling and clear functionality.

methods.name: commit
methods.description: Commits the current query to the global store and sends an accessibility announcement.

methods.name: $clear
methods.description: Clears the current search query and announces the clearing action.
